definition: ravings/delirious utterances/kyōgen (a form of traditional Japanese comic theater)
to speak conceited nonsense/to come out with arrogant claptrap

sentences.english: Your friends and family do not understand what you are ranting and raving about.
sentences.chinese: 您的朋友和家人不明白你是演說和狂言的。

sentences.english: His wild language resulted in a complete failure.
sentences.chinese: 他的出口狂言導致了他全盤的失敗。

sentences.english: Have my Ding male beauty in small letters dare to mouth crazy.
sentences.chinese: 有我丁大美男在，小字竟敢口狂言。

sentences.english: The ravings are gone to where this is emits hair head fellow in having the audacity mouth .
sentences.chinese: 這是哪裏冒出來的毛頭小子，竟敢口出狂言。

definition: to speak conceited nonsense/to come out with arrogant claptrap
lies/wild talk/to tell lies/to talk nonsense/fantasy (literature)
not to know the immensity of heaven and earth/an exaggerated opinion of one's own abilities

definition: babbling nonsense (idiom); crazy and unfounded ravings/double Dutch
